snippet: A guide to co-working in New York. If you want to be a great leader, start acting weirder. Why millions of new blue-collar jobs will open up over the next few years.
abstract: A guide to co-working in New York. If you want to be a great leader, start acting weirder. Why millions of new blue-collar jobs will open up over the next few years.

headline.main: Today in Small Business: 'Bloodletting' at Tony Hsieh's Start-Up Community
